bugs.description: CORSMiddleware allows wildcard origin '*' with allow_credentials=True, violating CORS security requirements. This combination is prohibited by the CORS specification as it creates security risks.
SessionMiddleware cookie configuration does not enforce 'Secure' flag when 'samesite=None'. This can lead to insecure cookies being accepted over non-HTTPS connections.
HTTPSRedirectMiddleware uses request.url.scheme directly without considering 'X-Forwarded-Proto' header, causing incorrect behavior when behind reverse proxies.
